
The Mozambique Cell Phone Savings Project Baseline database consists of 2,726 variables and 809 observations.
Due to the large number of variables, the database was split into 14 files that conform to the different modules of the questionnaire (refer to Baseline Questionnaire.docx). 
The 14 files are in STATA version 13 with the following names:
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleA.dta (8 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleB.dta (223 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleD.dta (188 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleE.dta (74 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleF.dta (1,162 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleG.dta (484 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleH.dta (122 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleI.dta (117 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleJ.dta (91 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleK.dta (78 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleL.dta (60 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleM.dta (47 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleN.dta (60 variables)
- Mozambique_baseline_ModuleO.dta (25 variables)
Note: There is no Module C because it was cut from the original questionnaire draft prior to data collection. The surveyID variable appears in all 14 files which explains the discrepancy between the actual total number of variables (2,726) and the sum of variables in the different files (2,739).


+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++





                                                                    Codebook
                                                                    ---------


Filename: Mozambique_baseline_ModuleA.dta
-----------------------------------------


Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier


ariable Name: isTreat
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
isTreat         float   %9.0g      treat      Treatment status
Value label:
treat:
           0 Control 
           1 Treatment 
 
 
Variable Name: isTrained
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
isTrained       byte    %17.0g     trained    1+ Household member trained in
                                                mobile money
Value label:
trained:
           1 Trained member 
           2 No trained member 
 
 
Variable Name: noTrainee
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
noTrainee       float   %9.0g      yesno      Constructed: Trained member
                                                unavailable for Modules N,O
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 


 
 
Variable Name: province
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
province        byte    %10.0g     prov       A01- Province
Value label:
prov:
           1 Nampula 
 
 
Variable Name: forum
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
forum           byte    %10.0g     forum      A02- Forum
Value label:
forum:
           1 Meconta 
           2 Monapo 
           3 Angoche 
           4 Mogovolas 
 
 
Variable Name: enumerator
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
enumerator      byte    %10.0g                A08- Enumerator Code

 
 
Variable Name: date
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
date            str28   %28s                  A09- Interview Date

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


Filename: Mozambique_baseline_ModuleB.dta
-----------------------------------------


Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier
 


Variable Name: hhSize
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hhSize          float   %10.0g                B00- How many people live in the
                                                household?
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: hhType
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hhType          float   %27.0g     genderHH   Constructed: Gendered household
                                                type
Value label:
genderHH:
           1 Female head, no adult male 
           2 Male head, no adult female 
           3 Male & female adult members 
 
 
Variable Name: lang
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
lang            byte    %10.0g     lang       B01- What is the main language
                                                spoken in the household?
Value label:
lang:
           1 Portuguese 
           2 Macua 
 
 
Variable Name: isMale_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
isMale_1        float   %9.0g      yesno      Constructed: Member 1 is male?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 
 
 
Variable Name: relationToHead_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
relationToHe~_1 float   %21.0g     relation   B04- What is the relation of
                                                [Member 1] to the main
                                                respondent?
Value label:
relation:
           1 Head 
           2 Spouse 
           3 Son/Daughter 
           4 Son/Daughter-in-law 
           5 Grandchild 
           6 Parent 
           7 Sibling 
           8 Nephew/Niece 
           9 Cousin 
          10 Brother/Sister-in-law 
          11 Father/Mother-in-law 
          12 Other relative 
          13 Domestic employee 
          14 Worker 
          15 Other 
 
 
Variable Name: age_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
age_1           byte    %10.0g                B05a- What is the age of [Member 1]
                                                in years?
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: ageMonths_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ageMonths_1     float   %10.0g                B05b- What is the age of [Member 1]
                                                in months?
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: idType_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
idType_1        byte    %22.0g     idtype     B06- ID Type [Member 1]
Value label:
idtype:
           1 Bilhete de Indentidade 
           2 BI Receipt 
           3 Cartao de eleitor 
           4 Cedula 
           5 Cartao de saude 
           6 No ID 
 
 
Variable Name: literate_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
literate_1      byte    %10.0g     yesno      B08- Can [Member 1] read and write?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 
 
 
Variable Name: inSchool_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
inSchool_1      byte    %10.0g     yesno      B09- Is [Member 1] going to school
                                                at the moment?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 
 
 
Variable Name: edLevel_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
edLevel_1       byte    %22.0g     edlvl      B10- What is the highest level of
                                                education that [Member 1] has
                                                completed?
Value label:
edlvl:
           1 No schooling 
           2 Primary 1-5 
           3 Primary 6-7 
           4 Secondary 8-10 
           5 Secondary 11-12 
           6 University or higher 
           7 Technical / vocational 
           8 Adult literacy 
           9 Religious education 
 
 
Variable Name: hasPrimary_1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hasPrimary_1    float   %9.0g                 Constructed: Member 1 has at least
                                                primary education
Value label:

Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hasSecondary_1  float   %9.0g                 Constructed: Member 1 has at least
                                                secondary education
Value label:

Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                Portuguese?
Value label:
spkport:
           1 Yes 
           2 A little bit 
           3 No

Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
isMale_8        float   %9.0g      yesno      Constructed: Member 8 is male?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 
 
 
Variable Name: relationToHead_8
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
relationToHea~8 float   %21.0g     relation   B04- What is the relation of
                                                [Member 8] to the main
                                                respondent?
Value label:
relation:
           1 Head 
           2 Spouse 
           3 Son/Daughter 
           4 Son/Daughter-in-law 
           5 Grandchild 
           6 Parent 
           7 Sibling 
           8 Nephew/Niece 
           9 Cousin 
          10 Brother/Sister-in-law 
          11 Father/Mother-in-law 
          12 Other relative 
          13 Domestic employee 
          14 Worker 
          15 Other

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label

                                                education that [Member 8] has

           7 Technical / vocational 
           8 Adult literacy 
           9 Religious education

Variable Name: freqVodacom_11
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
freqVodacom_11  byte    %10.0g     freq       B18- How frequently do [Member 11]
                                                use this number?
Value label:
freq:
           1 Always 
           2 Usually 
           3 Sometimes 
           4 Rarely 
           5 Never

                                                other cell phone number?

           0 No 
           1 Yes

              storage   display    value

                                                most about farming

Filename: Mozambique_baseline_ModuleF.dta
-----------------------------------------


Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier



 
Variable Name: rains
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
rains           byte    %26.0g     rain       F100- How was the rain this rainy
                                                season compared to a normal year?
Value label:
rain:
           1 Very little rain (drought) 
           2 Little rain 
           3 Slightly less than normal 
           4 Normal 
           5 Slightly more than normal 
           6 Much more than normal 
           7 Too much rain (flooding) 
 
 
Variable Name: cropValue_101
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                kilos [CROP 101]
Value label:

variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Value label:

yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

              storage   display    value

                                                crop? [Crop 104]

lowner:
         200 Husband & wife jointly 
         201 Leased from other villager 
         202 Leased from person outside village 
         300 Other

          23 Can (10L)

          31 Bag (30ml) 
          50 Other

Filename: Mozambique_baseline_ModuleG.dta
-----------------------------------------


Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier
 
 
Variable Name: inputName_101
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
inputName_101   str13   %13s                  Input Type [INPUT 101]
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: useInput_101
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
useInput_101    byte    %10.0g     yesno      G02- Did any household member use
                                                any [INPUT 101] on your farm in
                                                the past 12 mo
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

              storage   display    value

                                                101] on?
Value label:

Variable Name: decidesInput_108
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label

                                                to use [INPUT 108]
Value label:
lowner:
         200 Husband & wife jointly 
         201 Leased from other villager 
         202 Leased from person outside village 
         300 Other

Filename: Mozambique_baseline_ModuleH.dta
-----------------------------------------


Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier
 
 
Variable Name: anyLivestock
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
anyLivestock    byte    %10.0g     yesno      H01- Does anyone in your household
                                                own any livestock?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

                                                101]

Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier
 

 
Variable Name: groupDesc1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
groupDesc1      str36   %36s                  Label: Group 1
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: hasGroup1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
hasGroup1       byte    %10.0g     yesno      K01 - There exists a [GROUP 1] in
                                                your community?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label

                                                [GROUP 1]?

yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

              storage   display    value

                                                member? [YEAR JOINED] [GROUP 1]
Value label:
 
 
Variable Name: position1
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
position1       byte    %23.0g     grppos     K04 - What position do you hold in
                                                this group? [GROUP 1]
Value label:
grppos:
           1 President 
           2 Vice president 
           3 Treasurer 
           4 Secretary 
           5 Other committee member 
           6 Board member 
           7 Normal member 
           8 Other, non-board member

Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                meetings? [GROUP 1]
Value label:
freq:
           1 Always 
           2 Usually 
           3 Sometimes 
           4 Rarely 
           5 Never

Variable Name: surveyID
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
surveyID        float   %9.0g                 Household identifier
 
 
Variable Name: requestLoan
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
requestLoan     byte    %10.0g     yesno      L01- In the last 12 months did your
                                                household request a loan?
Value label:
yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes 
 
 
Variable Name: reasonLoan
Variable Details:

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
reasonLoan      byte    %40.0g     loanreason
                                              L02a- Why did you request the loan?
Value label:
loanreason:
           1 Purchase food 
           2 Purchase other goods 
           3 Doctor/Medicine 
           4 Special occasion (birth/wedding/funeral) 
           5 Purchase inputs 
           6 Purchase land 
           9 Other

                                              L16- Which of the following
                                                statements describes your current
                                                savings?
Value label:
savestatus:
           1 More than enough 
           2 Enough for regular consumption needs & small expenditures 
           3 Just enough for regular consumption needs 
           4 Not enough for consumption needs

              storage   display    value

yesno:
           0 No 
           1 Yes

              storage   display    value
variable name   type    format     label      variable label
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Value label:
nocell:
           1 Don't want one 
           2 Don't need one 
           3 Too expensive 
           4 No electricity access 
           5 No network signal 
           6 Other 
           7 Damaged 
           8 Lost/Stolen
